DOC.brief_summary: A multicenter study evaluate analgesic efficacy XP21L subject pain follow bunionectomy surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Multicenter Study Evaluate Analgesic Efficacy XP21L Subjects With Pain Following Bunionectomy Surgery
DOC.criteria: 1865 year age Have undergo bunionectomy surgery Have achieve adequate postsurgical pain Confounding medical condition preclude study participation Participated study another investigational drug device within 30 day prior randomization
